comment.author: 58725842@N08
comment._content: Known as "the country club" of Navy training airfields, the weeather was ideal for traiuning.  Robert Taylor hollywood actor,  was a naval flight instructor stationed at Livermore foe a perio incvluding 1943.  Tom Bush was also a naval flight instructor at that time.  He lter went on to become a well-known Pacific ocean sailboat racer.. Interestingly, his pre-war private flying experience allowed him to gain his commission and able to enlist and serve at this naval air station... A tour of Livermore California yields no familiar airfield remnants..
